name: Semiconductor Engineering Minimal Dark
description:
A theme that darkens semiengineering.com and removes some unneeded content (sponsors, stocks column).  
Find the full album of images here: http://imgur.com/a/gRMS3
additional_info:
==Update 7/16/19==
frontpage
* fix height of header logo to be smaller
* fix nav menu hover colors
* remove nav menu white border
* have nav menu emulate floating style from original site style
articles
* lighten background color of reply section
* fix color separation in prev/next article section at bottom
misc
* prettify

==Update 7/11/19==
* Fix for updated header/navbar

==Update 5/23/19==
* Support new knowledge-center pages
* Support new jobs page
* Fix broken footer spacing
* Fix broken prev/next article spacing
* Fix commenting section

==Update 7/25/17==  
Images of changes - http://imgur.com/a/iuZ3Y -
* Changed nav menu hover color
* Changed and moved semiE logo to be smaller when browsing
* Changed color of logo bar to blend better
* Removed sponsor/ad column that reappeared at the bottom of category pages
* Changed color of category header
* Fixed knowledge center page colors
* Changed 'special report' banner color
* Fixed breadcrumb text color
* Fixed startup corner page colors
* Fixed industry research page colors
